directions: Combine first 8 ingredients in large salad bowl. Sprinkle with feta. Whisk salad dressing, herbs and pepper in small bowl to blend. Pour over salad. Toss well.
ingredients: 1/2 head romaine lettuce, torn into pieces
1/2 head iceberg lettuce, torn into pieces
2/3 cup purchased olive oil and vinegar dressing
title: Greek Salad
